name: Staple Warrior
description:
What would you do if the company that you've worked with for nearly half your life turned out to be hiding a big secret? 

When you find out that your workplace is a front for an illegal drug cartel you know what you must do, leave your job behind in order to do the right thing and turn them in.

But will you make it out in time?

Features:

  • Play as an employee as you shoot your way past enemies with your stapler gun
  • Find keys to open new pathways and exit the building
  • Avoid various enemies that shoot and chase you
  • 7 explorable rooms full of enemies and secrets

Controls: 

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot
